A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best Star Wars since Empire Strikes Back.  I've seen them all in theaters and this movie had  several moments that blew me away. Can't understand the poor reviews as I don't think they saw the same movie I did. All my friends thought it was excellent.   I don't typically leave or read reviews here as reviews are always subjective. However I'm tired of my feed taking about this so I thought I'd throw my 2 cents in and raise the stupid aggregate score.
